awd_titl_txt: U.S.-Germany Cooperative Research:  Novel Multi-Channel     Propagator Approach to Atomic Calculations
awd_abstract_narration: This award supports Dr. Peter Winkler and a graduate student from the University of   Nevada-Reno to collaborate with L .S. Cederbaum of the Department of Theoretical   Chemistry at the University of Heidelberg.  The collaboration will develop propagator   theory for atomic and molecular structure calculations as well as for scattering problems.    The research focuses on atomic calculations with a novel multi-channel propagator   approach.  The research is likely to lead to many interesting applications of the new   formalism to the study of atomic processes in various environments.  Working with the   German group will give Dr. Winkler's group access to a considerable reservoir of   knowledge and computational expertise.
